Articles.Content:
Hi all! Another bug :

When looked at directly from above, paint marking decals disappear in the VAB and SPH (and maybe on the lauch pads but I couldnt check)

Pics for proof :

![0nvonvQ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/0nvonvQ.jpg)

![W05ZRgC.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/W05ZRgC.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T01:53:24Z" title="05/02/2015 01:53  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by Claw**

Yeah, it's a z-clipping issue. I don't know if it'll get fixed or not.

Cheers,

~Claw
